questions.sentence: @Leppie8184 For sure! You'll want to sort by Foundational or Beginner level content, since you're just beginning your Unity journey.
@UNDRTDmstrmnd No worries! Respawn Entertainment partnered with Multiplay for their game server hosting. Learn more:
@RunetideZ Hey Alex, we totally hear you and understand this is a major pain point for our users. We've made Multiplayer networking one of our major focus areas for 2021. You can learn more here:

@vjpudelski This 2D Game Kit may be a good place to start as you make your assessment: https://t.co/XpzAJEnqAbIt includes a walkthrough and video to help you along. We also have our user-supported 2D Forum as a resource for you as well:

Are you an emerging intermediate programmer, or were you part of Create with Code Live? Join us October 23 - 25 for our Create with Code game jam and build a game that you can use to showcase to potential employers: https://t.co/Wr8sM33YGb
@hardcore_hockey Ô∏è Keep up the great work with Hardcore Hockey Heroes! Really enjoyed your work so far with the player drafting screen. Looking forward to the updates!
ICYMI: Unite Now starts back up on October 13th! Filled with inspiring talks, demos, Q&As, and stories, these on-demand sessions are key to level up your Unity skills and knowledge. üß†

Sole creator of @FalconeerDev, shared with us details on his experience building a game for the new Xbox series, and what he‚Äôs most excited about for this upcoming new console release. Catch the full interview.
What might the future of distance look like? Join us Tuesday, October 13, at 5 pm PST as we discuss learning, teaching, and collaborating at a distance: https://t.co/rKq8nvxWlc
